content: App update - very poor, customer service team is very bad, they never reply. I had no issues before this update, Now i cannot turn alerts on or off! Are you going to fix this? Aug 19 Since my last review camera install had got a lot easier and customer service has got quicker at responding. Update 2020: Customer service has got worse, maybe the language barrier but I think it's down to laziest, I already have a ticket logged!
Love it :)
Too laggy!!! App and browser on pc to bad
had my netatmo security camera for five years now. apart from replacement sd cards when they expire it's been a great investment.

Updated from 3.1.4.6 to 3.2.0.27 and, as advised by Kate from Netatmo CS, the alerts did not return to "default" settings so thanks for the resolution and adding a star. Will do further checks for any other concerns. Would be good for the app to offer a backup per camera as memory cards do eventually fail thus learnt security data is lost.
Gr8
Excellent product, works 👌 easy setup
This app is lacking a lot of features that are present in the iOS version. for example the quick shortcut menu that appears when you long press the apps icon on iOS. Please update it!

I would give this camera a five star if it weren't for the price of them. I had issues with SD cards but have finally gotten it fixed. I just wish these cameras weren't 200 usd or over. I love the online interface and the app. The person detection sometimes throws animals and objects into it. But I have all motion throwing notifications. I wish I could afford many more.
Camera is becoming very hot during operation and this reduces mean time between failures. After 1.5 years of operation, the IR (night vision is not working anymore...
Has been pretty dependable, works best on fast wifi
Camera works well inallconditions
La caméra n'est plus configurable en ethernet. Dans le meilleur des cas l installer propose le WiFi
Just install a camera. Looks good so far. Update September 2020 Best security system ever! All the features advertised actually work perfectly. Customer service is great also.
When there's an update all the notifications get set to High Priority and with sound. Even the ones I set to No Sound so I don't get woken up because a cat ran across the lawn.

App says camera is off on the unit, Netatmo online solution is to turn it on via the app, guess what, there is no option to do this on the app. Well done Netatmo No physical helpline available either Give it all a miss if you take my advice
Why do you want to know my exact location for setup? Why do you need me to turn on GPS location?
Constant problems with memory card. Not possible to ignore lawn mower robot, which is recorded 50 times per night!
TOP SMOOTH PHONE SMART
Stop switching on every notification after every update!!
Great app. Works perfectly.
Love my Netamo camera!
Great and simple to use!

I Used to love this camera until App started asking me to identify people I'd never seen before. Definitely they were never in my home. This happened on two separate occasions and I had to unplug the camera permanently for fear that the same thing was happening to my family on someone else's system. I saved the screenshots of the people in case anyone doesn't believe me. After months, the developers haven't replied to this post so it makes me think it's a known issue.
I would like to be able to fine-tune my notifications better. For example "notify evry time you see a car, but only between 11pm and 6am if you see a person"
Very good help to take care about our house!

Le système fonctionne assez bien mais il faudrait une solution pour facilement signaler/changer l'état de l'alarme. (par exemple des raccourcis ou widgets pour changer entre "à la maison/parti" et la possibilité de changer le niveau d'alarme en fonction de l'heure. Ex: alarme si visage inconnu la nuit uniquement pour éviter les déclenchements non souhaités.) Il me semble que la détection via position ne fonctionne pas vraiment. Donc encore des améliorations possible via l'appli. Eng: The system works relatively well, but it misses an option to quickly switch between alarm configuration. (eg some shortcut or widget to change state between "home/away" and a possibility to define alarm security action depending on schedule. eg: only alarm in case of unknown face at night to avoid false alarms during the day) There also seems to be an issue with the geolocation, it never seems to detect it properly. So they are still some improvements to be done in the app.
Could not configure two camera with this app and no real help on the net. Good money wasted on the camera's

app is getting better - but missing: #1: option to silent notifications for x number of hours on a single camera (go out in the garden you get flooded with notifications notifications - turn off you forget to enable again). . #2: who was at the door 10 sec ago? I can't see - needs to be able watch while it's recording - maybe just still images!!. . #3: walking around the house gives a lot of notifications: they need to be "cluster aware" and have a threshold on notify.
Excellent, no issues with app or product, highly recommend for peace of mind...

Before the update you could at least label the events properly even though it didn't change the fact that it calls ALL movements a person. But now the app will only let me re -label the first picture in a series even when i have selected the next one..
Great security camera

Lags, slow playback, no sensitivity settings, no settings for when infrared is turned on. My cam is under a dark overhang, so it goes on way too early. Also gets triggered on audio and wind moving plants, and on precipitation, way too often! Even when only people should be triggering. Also, the AI triggers for humans with animals now (rabbits). This causes notifications to get ignored, so when it's needed you're no longer watching.. But they gave us a dark theme, so I will add a star.
"Tell Welcome everybody has left" not triggering/changes anything.
Problem has been fixed. Thanks
Works well. Stable program. AI sensing features are pretty good.

Fixed the sound bug have you? Why can't I just turn the the bloomin sound off but keep the notifications? The sound is annoying and distracting, please sort it out! P.S. I am using the latest version of Android and still cannot just turn the sound OFF!! Add in the detection algorithm has problems with shadows from trees that move with the sun and reflections of clouds on car window, etc. But please, please allow me to turn the f'ing sound OFF due to continuous false detections despite telling it
The new app is a lot worse. Less intuitive and not as easy to use. Big video stills please. I'm quite sad, I have been happy with the app for years!
Perfect app! Updated regularly with new functionality. Never crashed on me and I like the default app notification sound :)
Tech Support (Alice) addressed my issue.
Okay
EMUI 10.1 is not compatible with Cannot connect to the server.

Started off with a presence camera then added 2 indoor cameras, since then I have had the original plus 2 other replacement outdoor cameras fail, seems to be an issue with the memory cards and the IP rating as water is getting into them, hopefully you will upgrade the external camera very soon as at the moment it is not fit for purpose, also unable to turn the flood light on manually from app anymore, I'm an Electrician who knows how to install these.
Great!
Put one up on the front of the house, thinking of getting another for the back garden. Works well so far.

The camera is a really bad product or I can call it an overpriced garbage... after 3 years the camera "died" after a heavy rain. Now I will finally buy a proper camera to replace this junk. It was so annoying to receive fake notifications on daily basis. The product itself is bad, but the app is far worse! Bye bye netatmo! I will not miss you, that's for sure!
Since the last update , my notification stopped working .... Don't know why did no change anything Thanks for fixing this
Not a great experience, cameras aren't reliable and I've had two fail on me over the years for no apparent reason.
Works great...

it's ok, I ju cannot do the sound test of smoke alarm to complete setup. The description on that line overflows behind screen border and any interactive element is out of screen and I do not know what to do to activate it. App does not support horizontal orientation either.
Easy to install and great features.
Very useful and easy to use.

Brilliant app. Lots of things to toggle, cars, people, animals and motion detection, adding other users in your family the list goes on. Love the app notification when the camera is triggered giving me peace of mind with a warning so I can respond immediately if needed during the night. It's not a big issue but I noticed on a iPhone you can zoom in but on my android I can't. Also can I suggest the ability to delete multiple recordings via the app as removing one by one is a bit monotonous
Easy to install and works brilliantly.
Very good camaras I love it Gggggggggggg

Great Camera Poor App. The lag between camera and app is pretty appalling. App sounds cannot be changed, should be more customizable. Live footage stalls a lot and camera feed also doesn't come through sometime. Need the ability to remove multiple recordings.
Hi, app has been fab and love the update allowing multiple deletions but suddenly we are having a delay between camera activity and app notifications of up to 25 minutes which isn't helpful.
Great app, love using this security camera in our front yard! Clear footage and unobtrusive notifications! Would recommend this camera and app!

I wanted to give a less good star rating, but seeing that you do answer customer questions/concerns I leave it for now with 4 stars to show my goodwill. On Samsung Galaxy S10 and Samsung Note 9 the location service is not being used to determine whether someone is home although that option is activated. I will absolutely change this review if you give me a tip that leads to this functionality working or if you update the app for that to work. Other than that solid, have the cam 1 day now.

Absolute garbage - they wasted time on the graphical interface update, but it was appearance only. The ridiculous menu structure and the multitude of other problems weren't solved at all. And no dark mode...
Love the system
Told the app it identified the wrong person and it deleted the event? Shouldn't have asked who it was instead?
Nice app
easy to use app. 👍👍👍

Beware! This camera was okay until it started sending me notifications for people I have never seen and who were obviously not in my home. It's asking me to identify at least 20 strangers which means our faces are showing up on other people's apps. This is downright creepy. How can this be a secure camera/app if it's doing that. As a security professional I can tell you this camera is not secure otherwise it wouldn't be doing that. Beware! I would love to see what Netatmo has to say about that.
Excellent
Needs an easy way to copy video and better UI.
Super user friendly. Good picture quality. The app is fast and responsive.

I like that you can now set the playback resolution, but I can't find a way of it defaulting to 1080p, I have to manually set it each time? Also I'm a little concerned since they changed their App logo, the fact it just says security (no mention of netatmo) makes me think they're going to be taken over or are going under? :-/
Love the new changes Great app and products

Le funzionalità sono ottime. Una stella in meno perché con l'aggiornamento dell'app avete usato una UI bianca quando invece tutta la UI di Android sta migrando verso una dark mode che trovo piú elegante (ed in teoria risparmiosa di batteria). Almeno date la possibilità di scegliere. Grazie
Brilliant. Can't fault it
wery good,i recommend 3 of them..then you have all of your property cleared 👍
Much better experience now
App is top. Quick and functional.
Camera is great, app is good and does what it needs to do.

The camera so far has proven to be very good, my biggest gripe are the security features of the app. I live in a shared home and I really like that I can share the app view with housemates for shared security and openness with each other but it does not let you restrict access to settings, meaning anyone can just turn it off or adjust alert window making this camera useless for security application.
Basic,more options like test smoke detector via app
The user interface is very confusing to put it mildly, after you have figured that out it works as expected.
Love it
Good software that captures everything
Had netatmo cameras for several years & I can with no reservation say this app is totally useless Do not waste your time or money on this app or this product Will be replacing it
Top product, very good software, splendid face recognition

Its no good getting extra features when their servers are not even available! So nothing works! Since the last update outages have increased a lot! Misinformation messages have increased! Not happy!! I need to start/stop when needed, not when someone allows!!

It doesn't work properly. The Video is unavailable and the Camera is disconnected in spite of the unit being plugged in. Then again I have to put it upside down to restart it. Also no notification comes on my phone.
An amazing piece of kit..
Using with outdoor cameras, works wonderfully as advertised. Very happy with the app for the Netatmo products.

Silly app can't delete Netatomo products when the product has already been reset to Factory Defaults. It gives an error and asks to try again later. Also there is no option to delete the Netatmo account.
I prefer the previous warning sound which let you know some one is approaching the front door.

Very easy to set up, great quality and sound, I only wish I didn't have to identify the same person over and over but that's due to making sure the camera identifies the right person due to different facial expressions, other then that the app is very easy to use 😊😁
Excellent, Only one fault. The notification sound for motion detection sounds like a siren, and when it goes off in the car I think a emergency vehicle Is coming, could I change it ?
Perfect
Apps worked really well and good support too Over all never had trouble with it
Fantastic way to monitor your home without unnecessary notifications.

Good solid bit of kit if you like the industrial look. Works very well and is reliable. I have mine saving video via ftp to Synology Nas box which then bounces it up to my 2 Tb Google drive, so no cloud storage fees. This is probably one of the few devices I have purchased that has totally met my expectations. I recommend.
Why do you need access to the location to connect a Bluetooth device?

Great, everything works well, beautifully designed camera. However there is no ability to look back to a specific date and time in the app. I would expect to see that in such a expensive system. At least mimic what's in the $20 wyze cam so we don't have scroll down for ages. Also, no Google drive or other cloud providers except Dropbox. No ability to connect the presence via ethernet. LED light in the presence is not diffused enough so you can still see each LED which takes away from its looks.
Great app for a brilliant camera.
Since the latest update. It no longer seems to update my location when I leave the house. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app same issue. Galaxy s10 latest update
Video downloads aren't working
great cameras and great app and always updated to fix issues
New method of deleting old viewing is excellent and speedy a great new development
Good
Brilliant product
Thanks for updating notifications
Bug since update. Will only play one video before having to close and restart. Otherwise anything selected in list won't play

I have already contacted your service without any reply back. On both iOS and Android, the quality of the video stream either live or recorded one is pixelated at 360p resolution. That can only adjusted on a PC. Occasionally it can on the android app when pressing several times on the resolution sign at the bottom right corner , and there is no option on iOS. Quite disappointing when the camera itself is a really nice piece of technology.

Zoom feature is nice, but after last update you can not any longer switch from one episode to another without exiting the application... annoying. Also, face identification dialog now looks worse than it was.

My NetAtmo outdoor camera sends daily about 30-40 notifications “person seen “, while seeing any of my 3 dogs or birds on ground. For weeks I try to teach the camera that these are animals but I still receive wrong notifications. For any wrong notification I do -> improve detection / this is an animal / validate. Please let me know if I have to continue validate or the camera cannot really distinct animals from persons.

Been a long time user, generally it has been flawless with rare occasional disconnects for 20mins, and odd things which haven't been picked up. Customer service very good, which is the key thing. I have opted same security system in another home as a testiment of how good these are (I've tried other highstreet brands like Swann, Yale, Arlo and Ring).
Remove the new notification sound, it's awful and annoying. I cannot edit it, there's just an on off flag for smart notifications.
Appears to have lost some functionality - unable to switch between lights/cameras in live mode and set video retention period on the SD card
Love it
The floodlight cameras are excellent though, the light does trigger sporadically for unidentified motion even if deselected.

I've had these for 2 years. They have "sometimes worked" yesterday they both decided to completely fail at the same time and have not turned on since. Don't buy this garbage, much more trouble than they are worth

Detection areas requires abilty to draw shapes as not all detection zones are rectangular. Ability to have seperate detection zone for turning the light on. I record.the car on the street but only want the light to turn on when someones at the door.
App does not handle high aspect ratio screens correctly when displaying full screen video.
The live camera is really slow and delayed. I could walk out of the next room and see myself in the camera. Not so live to me.

I'm trying to install this app on a brand new phone with Android pie. the app just keeps crashing when i try to start it. Edit: i was able to get the app to work on the OnePlus 7 Pro by having the app crash a few times when trying to start it. After the third crash, the app started up and didn't crash anymore. It also continued to work afterwards. Very weird.
always having problems to cocnect to camera even if app sent me an alert! Please fix it ....camera is very good and easy to install.
ok
love it. great protection against trespassers
good cams, shore with updates things will be less tedious
best security camera out of the dozen I've tried. worth the expensive price tag

This app is too basic and the little it does, it doesn't do very well at all. You can specify a detection zone but you cannot adjust the sensitivity and the zone must be of a certain minimum size so not ideal for covering smaller areas. Also, the number of false positive notifications produced are ridiculous. It also notifies me every time a person or animal walks past a car and is seen on the reflection of the car or if a car goes past with their headlights on.
very happy with nenatmo presence and the app. great security.
just updated the app and lost all history of events from my cameras. now all i get is the live view. if this issue isn't resolved soon then the cameras were a waste of money.

Can't download video despite I can watch it. The re is no feedback form in the app so I can not ask for help in resolving this issue. Notifucation cinfig is for camera not a user, so if my wife turns it of I do not receive notifications as well.
really good identification and easy to use. It could be improved by having days of the week in the notification schedule, but otherwise very good
Mostly ok but viewing recorded footage in landscape often flips upside down.

It ok but to call it smart is a joke. it keeps giving security allerts on our un moving car and windy trees. I keep applying the other tag to windy trees but nothing really changes. Its anoyng as hell when at work and you get 20 notifies.
sometimed complex but good
Just works, easy to setup and good quality video, shame it only works with Dropbox
Surveilance and everything is great but videos will not download for some reason. I have a good connection and everything yet videos just wont download.

Netatmo welcome camera is of great video quality. The application is constantly improving and it's very important. The device is hot as hell all the time. Talking through the device, so the voice can be heard from device, is missing. A very pricey one.
Netatmo is AWESOME!

Great app, which sends almost instant alerts from my Presence camera to my phone wherever I am in the world. You can choose between one or all of people, cars and animals, and the software is very accurate. It's also useful to be able to set alert zones to prevent unwanted activations. It's just a shame you can't set the app to ignore recognised faces. The automatic uploading of clips to Dropbox is free and again works great. Customer service have been good when contacted too.
Just got a second Presence Cam and the Android app wont let me turn on or off the floodlights. It shows the switch for both on iOS but not android.
Never happened before but now keeps disconnecting and not picking up motion and won't work properly, no information on the application who to contact for help
cool
Excellent!

Vraiment efficace, fiable et facile d'utilisation. la détection est parfois trompé par le soleil qui apparait, mais le plus souvent, la différence animaux/véhicules/personnes est faite sans problème. Vraiment satisfait
Disconnect every times
good

very complicated setup, annoing unstable, no wifi fallback list, very complicated ssid change, front glass fall out after ca. 1 year since montage, unable to set recording properties for each camera separately,
people and animals recognition is outstanding, but camera quality worse than raspberry pi €20 camera.
since this upgrade the app automatically goes to settings when opened.

Why aren't we keeping up to date with technology. We should add an Alexa video skill so the alexa screened devices can look at the cameras. Used first time as a baby monitor. The app stays running in full screen which is brilliant! Would howrver be great to be able to take screenshots when on full screen video mode and an improvement on stream speed.

The Welcome works fine. I have to refresh the app or web page every so often to make connection, but for what it is it works. I would like if the power cord was a little longer, and if there was a way to make it ignore the TV. I don't have any desire to turn monitoring off and on, so "zone" detection would be nice. I found the included 8Gb card ran out too quickly, so upgraded to 32Gb. Other than that, I'm satisfied with my Welcome.
cool. fast and great for kids and family when someone gets home
Most stable home video camera app It has awsome features and the user has full control over everything Awsome app and products!
app updated camera worked for a few seconds now constantly says sd card working then not working then working again then wont give live view
updated now it goes to settings every time I open the app on my phone annoying
Good flood camera
brilliant thanks well pleased with it
super dela
Really a good device and well made app for it.

I have been using the welcome camera for a couple of years now and love it. had an issue with SD card recently and tech support worked with me and replaced the item as well as stayed in contact until resolved. great service.

Notifications are delayed, sometimes by hours so this is useless as a security camera. After lots of back and forth with support it was deemed by Netatmo that my internet upload speed is too slow - despite it being 10x faster than the required speed published on Netatmo's web page. When I pointed this out, I was told it was a misprint on their page. The webpage still hasn't been updated. Buyer beware!

good camera and concept but poor execution via unreliable app. app used to be good and you could see live stream without any issues but not anymore. I have one or two cameras giving good live view and others not. all on the same network. if you have multiple cameras then the notification set for one camera applies to all. this should be customisable based on individual camera but it isn't. very few settings are customisable per individual camera.

everything stopped working...when I load the app it loads to a blank screen and I have to click back, then videos wont play even though all the thumbnails are there, and ontop of that I no longer get alerts to any movement or people and animals. not impressed, perhaps I should have gone with ring
Actulally works as well as being a great gizmo to play with !
Pretty good app. Would be handy to have a function to disable monitoring for x hours. So you don't have to remember to turn it back on.
great security cam...
Why did you remove the mailbox category for tags? And what did happened to the future option to add tag to outdoor camera? Have waited too long for this to go live, and now you removed it?
Great security system. No subscription fees. Have two of the outdoor cameras and one indoor camera
can you please give us option to set the notification sound?

Feature rich and great picture, love how it connects to the electrics and wifi rather than PoE or battery. No subscription needed either, with your own FTP server support, or if you do want cloud storage dropbox is supported. Nest could learn a thing or two, I hate subscription services when there is no need. Fully support this product!
The app has come on a long way. It's now very reliable and generally works well. Presence cameras have issues if the WiFi signal strength isn't very good.
Great app
Perfect App and system ... Feel safe and secure while away
great

great camera . Very easy to install. The only thing i would ask for is to be able to chose alarm sounds when camera detect movement. At the moment there is only one very short sound ( it won't wake me up during the night when something is going on ) . Netatmo team please ad more choice of alarm sounds. thanks.

im very glad to use a perfect app and camera like this . the only remark i have here to improve the product technically is to make the camera work also when we don't have electricity by adding a battery or something like that
Super product

I've had this camera/app running for almost 2 years. Picture and sound have been reliable and excellent. My only problem has been uploading to dropbox; used to be very reliable, now will work 3 or 4 days then no more; have unlinked and relinked Dropbox, but it's hit & miss.
good
very good product

I thought it was a lot of money to pay out for a camera but you cannot believe what you can do with this camera you can set it up so it will ignore your next door neighbours cat you even have isolated hotspots that you want to keep an eye on very easy to set up all you need is a power supply and follow the instructions
Ok
Easy to install and setup camera.
Great

video playback is hit and miss, sometimes just plays the sound. Video download no longer works just says failed with no reason why. Notifications and live playback are also delayed... get better performance from £30 Xiaomi cameras

The cameras are great and just what I wanted. Great image during the day and night. The algorithm for animal detection is very very broken though. Haven't seen a positive detection of our dogs for months now, even though I "improve detection" everyday.
Excellent.
iove it

works pretty well, i would like that location on phone could trigger that you have arived at home, it's ok when you leave! perhaps the possibility to priority storage eg. ftp before sd-card or other storage than dropbox.
love it amazing
Videos don't play most of the time and get stuck on the first frame.

Really easy to use, and love the fact that you don't need a specific subscription to store the recordings. There's an SD card and you can also use a Dropbox account or ftp server. Set up was quick and easy, although fine tuning the settings took a bit longer.
QR code lost. camera presence irrecoverable. mail assistant absent. you lose yours money.
This Camera is by far the best security camera that I have ever owned period!!

Great app with easy setup. Crystal clear picture. Easy to select different cameras. Only negative comments would be that the video is not time and date stamped and that you cannot zoom in when video is paused but other than those 2 little issued all great.

Very functional and reliable. Only one disadvantage, you could not select more than one video in order to delete. It means that if you have a lot of video in the list it take a very long time to suppress them
A great wee setup can see what's going on anywhere anytime, just wish that you could buy as a whole set at once, for what l'm got worked out quiet dear but know it's a very good system.
Great for a quick security fix and easy to install

Hi, I'm using the app with Your new smart smoke detector and I'm facing big power consumption. The app has several hours a day long wakelock and consuming about 8% of battery charge. Any idea how to stop this wakelock?
The exterior camera is awesome. It is very common for it to detect our cats as humans, though
Excellent camera, sensor works well and light is bright without blinding the neighbours. Using it mounted on a pole about 9 feet above the drive. Also, integrated into Samsung Smartthings.

I've been using it for over a year now and the facial recognition has gotten progressively worse. At first the Welcome camera recognized everything. Now I would estimate facial recognition works 20-30% of the time, if that. Not only that, but to call the live stream 'live' is a bit of a joke. Most of the time there is a 5-10 second delay which I assume is because of the facial recognition but since that doesn't work great either its just a pain. The geofencing doesn't seem to work either. It did when I first got the camera and app but no longer does. I definitely wouldn't recommend this for anything more than a little gimmick to show your friends.
Work great. Brilliant
Easy peasy and very effective.
Great app and camera to go with it. Very good a recognising people and pets after you train it. Excellent
Excellent
Fantastic....love the paws
Didn't work, got a blank screen. FAQ says my internet speed is slow which is absolute rubbish. Luckily I didn't purchase the camera.

I will give you 5 star if: -support google drive. -in coverage are support more detail. right now only squar and rectangle are supported. - tell the support team please please change the sd card slot design for security camera!! it took 3 hours from me! it wired since there is a hole behine the sd card slot!
Since update all my camera notifications have stopped . I can't set it up to make any noise now. Very frustrating
The latest update, 2.3.2.0 appears to have solved a long standing Android 8.0.0 problem with Geofencing. Thanks.
Works like a charm, the delay in the video is hugh but overall a good app Hard to find all the settings sometime
The notification sounds are broken again! Does anyone do QA on the app?
Great product!

fanstatic product very easy to set up very clear images great zone detection areas (can be adjusted for specific areas) great on zone types ie animals /people /cars/other  great on no cloud subs  get notifications as and when you want them get one they are brill ive just ordered another one

Appalling customer service and the feature to refine detection not working mean that this cannot be recommended. There is no telephone support and emails go unanswered, with follow up emails and formal complaints simply ignored. There is a feature to refine detection, but despite my telling it countless times that a small windmill is not a person it still detects it as a person. Really disappointing for such an expensive system, and clearly Netatmo can't be bothered to help its customers or fix the issues with their system.
I think this keeps it simple. Perhaps could be alerted less from animals or other non-criminal activities so maybe that could be improved
Fuc+ the weird ones this is the best
Netatmo do what others do not enough good do: face recognition, nice design, dropbox connection...

I have no idea what people are on about when they discredit this, it works fine. Yes the notifications are annoying, but I just turned them off. Camera and spotlight work great as a deterrent to possible intruders, and if they persist, you've got video of them. 4/5 🌟
A lot of work put in at the start to identify people, but now works very well.

Installed app then it disappeared from my phone. Tried reinstalling but 
wouldn't install for some reason:-(

I've had the Netatmo Presence for just over a month and am impressed with the features and image quality. The App works fine on both my Samsung Galaxy S4 and Nexus 7 tablet. I did reduce the notifications so that they are only sent when a person is detected during the evening/night with all other activity being just recorded. The alert zones are a little limited with the minimum size and shape being quite a large rectangle but they're good enough. Uploading to my Dropbox account also works well although I did set the image quality to medium in order to conserve space. I also upgraded the memory card to 64GB as the supplied 8GB card only held 2 or 3 days worth of recordings.
Great app
I have had it for some time now and it is very good
Perfect for me
I'm not able to see my cam! The app freeze loading and it never stop!!

Rien ne marche depuis 1 jour "problème connection internet". Après 
vérification tout est ok chez moi. J'ai plusieurs appareils connectés chez 
moi et tout fonctionne sauf Netatmo Weather et Netatmo Security ! Donc au 
lieu de marquer "problème connection internet" marqué plutôt "nous avons un 
problème avec les serveurs Netatmo"

Giving a one star in the hope Netatmo see this and respond. The automatic 
marking me away when my phone leaves the home area does not on my phone 
running Android 8.1.0. It works for my husband every time on Android 7.0. 
This is a real annoyance as it means having to update status manually. 
Please fix ASAP! If I can provide any info or logs to assist please let me 
know who to send to.

The only big issue is that it doesn't send notifications, although the 
settings have been selected to allow them. This used to work ok, so I 
assume this is a bug introduced in an update. Please issue a fix for it, as

I can NOT stand all the damn notifications I recieve. Even after turning 
all of them off...if you're going to have an option, MAKE SURE IT WORKS. I 
get a million alerts everytime anything goes infront of the camera. So

Great indoor cam

This product feature non-functional geo-location and erratic facial recognition. It will redefine for you the meaning of the words "useless" and "frustration". I also have a weather station but the welcome camera and the security app are not recommended.

The product/camera is great but not being able to set a custom notification and it using the default notification sound is just ridiculous and this needs addressing/fixing. There should also be an option NOT to issue a notification within a user defined 'n' time of the last notification, so that if I'm in view of the camera, washing the car/gardening, etc I don't get 50 notifications blaring away if I choose not to be notified of new movements that are within 60 seconds of the previous movement notification.
Great camera &app if only I could get rid of the spiders

Generally works well. Would appreciate if it would only put up a single 
notification instead of one for every event. I live in a busy street and 
can easily get 20 alerts an hour meaning notifications from other apps get 
lost. Being able to turn the notify sound off is great. Would appreciate 
being able to have monitoring zones that just record rather than notify as 
well. Would be good if they can overlap or have a shape other than 
rectangle. It is really hard to get the (triangular) area coverage I need 
with rectangles of limited minimum size that can't overlap.

Just have 2 installed. The second one was unfortunately defective but got 
it replaced. Cameras are set up around small holding and have difficulty in 
recognising difference between animals and humans but fortunately this can 
be fine tuned, just takes a bit of time. It would be even better if 
individual household members could adjust settings independently according 
to their own needs. Currently if one user adjusts settings it effects all 
devices in use. Despite above constructive criticism, only have presence 
fully installed one month and am quite happy with both cameras and 
floodlights.
Does what I hoped and does it well

App is ok but AI and support are terrible. Camera sees my cats or washing

everything. Avoid!

A system like this is only as good as its weakest point and unfortunately Netatmo seems to be inconsistent in some areas. My wife and I will leave the house at the same time yet it will mark her as having left but not me. This then requires me to manually update the app to say I've left, otherwise we won't receive notifications of any activity seen by the camera and therefore adding a manual step where I have to check that it has me marked away from home. The movement detection is generally accurate, although it quite often seems to identify movement with a person but not see their face for identification. Definitely room for improvement but the quality of video is good and face recognition a good idea. It's emerging technology so don't expect perfection.
it's a great camera
Pretty good needs work on discrimination.
Nice app, not perfect but it works reasonably well

What a crappy app. Nothing is working and every time you click back button, app kicks you out. App randomly decides when you can recognize and identify people. Camera itself is constantly disconects even it's connected with lan cable. What a wasted £100...

This camera is amazing, recording quality is pretty high, tagging and notifying is impressive. I love it. I sit overseas and watch my home whenever I like.

Works well with the awesome camera. I find it more useful than my 3K external security system.

I have the outdoor camera. Hardware seems good and the app works OK but lots of room for improvement given the price. Playback never starts 1st time and there's very little customization. The menus are painfully slow.

In principle it is a great product. The distance it"sees" is much greater than it publishes.  But.....its idea of animals only covers four legged versions. No use at all if you have chickens! - they become"persons"!! App is good, only fails to connect every time. Very good in principle, but needs more development.

The outdoor camera works well and the storage to Dropbox is seamless. However there are way too many false positives of "person detected" when it's actually just a bird feeder swinging in the wind. It detects pigeons and larger, also cats. Detection of rabbits sometimes works, but not always. That's a pity as it's one of the reasons we bought the unit.
Just the job for protecting a remote storage container. Connected off 4g router and intend to power from solar panels. Working at the moment, just hope the dynamic IP won't mess things up.
Only thing missing is the option to select multiple events at once to delete them from time line. It's a pain having to select one at a time.
Great app that helps us secure our home. Makes me feel safer after a robbery last year. Wish we'd had this before our house was broken into.
A few glitches, such as video view splitting when going to landscape view, menu options vanishing and default app name of 'Security' need work. Does get the job done though.
presence👍

The app freezes a lot for me. The light does not go out even after I choose auto in settings telling it to come on only if a 'person' is seen. However sometimes it does not make the distinction. Also, I thought the camera records every five minute intervals but there have been large gaps. The camera and light suit their purpose but the software let's both down. Sometimes the light comes on too late and goes off too early, despite the 'alert zone' being set. I would prefer sharpness and consistency in the software, it is clumsy at  times ...for example the camera keeps picking up a car as a person, not all the time does it do this, but sometimes. Why? Its great that I can view what is happening at home from anywhere but it is only when I am at home can I pick up that the light is not turning off or that a car is being taken for a person. Please fix if possible. It would be good to have a timer on the light too, for exple it stays on for 10s etc. Otherwise this is a fantastic product and I have no regrets in buying it...but it needs some improvements for me personally. The light is impressively bright. Its staying on longer than necessary can be annoying to our neighbours or road users as we are on a busy road. I have clicked on 'improve detection' but, not so good. Its good but can be so much better. Thanks.
Feels like a beta version, I have this app both on my phone and tablet and it is buggy on both. It does the job but needs to be stopped and restarted regularly to get full functionality.

Seems to work pretty well. Camera quality is not as good as my old canary cameras but everything else works better. I do wish I could block off a zone to not see motion. My camera is aimed at the front door with a small window in it. Everytime a car turns up a side street, the camera sees the light as movement and notifies me. Also rather use geofencing as indicator of who's home or not. Face recognition is sporadic at best.

Great product. Easy to use. Nice User Interface. They even responded within days to my problem and fixed it. App is great, very clear overview of videos , lots of settings so I get only the alerts I need. Easy to see what has happened during a day and to download videos. Great also to have a Dropbox in the main menu.

After all this time I'm very disappointed that there have been no improvements to the general functioning of the app, it's incredibly slow and buggy, the loading times are too long for any action taken in the app and there is no option to completely turn off notifications for unknown faces, why this is not available is beyond me, I can't imagine it being hard to implement. The indoor camera gets hot to the point where you can't even touch it. The latest update unnecessarily rings three times per notification and we still don't have the option to set our own notification sounds for the app and for specific people.
software is horrible

I have the Netatmo welcome, the camera is still very slow at uploading video, however since the latest update it is much better at registering new faces, just a shame that the tags are such bad quality.

For the money you have to pay to get the camera, an app that works would be helpful. The videos rarely play. It detects a shadow but not a car. A rip off product that needs a lot of development. Since the last update it now won't detect cars.
Unusably slow. Not sure if that's related to the app or the camera itself but it's near impossible to do anything, even at home on the same network as the camera. Disappointing to put it mildly
Multiple false motion detection issues per minute makes this an utter waste of time. Still waiting for official support feedback.

We have had our netamo presence and welcome cameras for coming up to a year now so are in a good place to review their performance. The app in short is underdeveloped and under-supported. There are numerous bugs which don't seem to be addressed including, unresponsive at telling welcome all have left or individual people have left, not loading thumbnails or only loading half of them, not loading video, crashing, and generally a slow and clunky experience. The algorithms behind detection are in need of a serious update, sunlight on cars sets off alerts, improve detection option does nothing as it still identifies the same events incorrectly. Additionally, welcome not recognising pets unlike the presence means a house with animals has many alerts a day. There is a high number of false positives that leads to alarm fatigue which defeats the purpose of having a security product in your home. Also I would be interested to know where the logs for the device are kept, as anything on my network should be reporting to my SIEM. When first looking at home security the choice was between Netamo or Nest, after considerable time using netamo I can honestly say I wish I picked Nest. Hopefully things improve or it may just be worth sinking the cost and buying another product.
Worked well for a year then slowed right down. Unusable. Tried reinstalling everything, no effect.
Keep getting slower and slower. Love the camera but the app takes forever.

The Netatmo Welcome camera is a pretty good 1080 capable camera in a very elegant housing. Unfortunately, I found the setup frustrating (zero documentation) and it took me four attempts  to connect. Finally doing so via ethernet. The facial recognition is an interesting idea but the software has considerable room for improvement both in terms of usability and the accuracy of the recognition itself. There is no telephone support although e mail requests have seen responses both swift and helpful.
Chromecast support and the ability to download snapshots, not just 24h timelapse, would be nice.

This is ridiculous, spent over 200 on this thing and can't get past setup! It just tells me to turn it upside down then says can't continue its not like I have an ancient phone. Tried from my desktop and it says couldn't connect with WiFi.  Is this a joke? If this thing isn't fixed I expect the company to take this company to take back their product and refund me!

The app is not perfect but when dealing with WiFi, people's faces and video things are bound to be less than perfect. Having said that after 15 mins and a device software upgrade everything was working seamlessly to the point where I was uncomfortable with how easy it was to watch people remotely.
